Web Hosting

Experience a ultra-fast and reliable web hosting environment

The performance of your website is directly related to the characteristic of your web hosting plan. Here at THC Servers we are offering a cheap web hosting service that keeps your website up and running.

Regardless of whether you buy a cheap web hosting plan, reseller hosting, vps hosting or a dedicated server, you'll always get the quality that is behind our brand. This is our guarantee... along side the 99.9% uptime guarantee of course.

Get Started
Domain Registration

Take advantage of our cheap domain name prices and find your perfect domain today

The first interaction between your website and visitors is represented by the domain name. Give as much thought when choosing the domain and make sure you find one that is easy to remember and stands out.

Don't worry about the prices. Here at THC Servers we have over 320 cheap domain names. Choose from the popular top level domains or get creative and pick one of the hundreds of gTLDs.

Get Started
Web Design

Professional website design and development services

We create efficient websites with a unique design and a user experience that engages the viewers and generates more leads.

Crafted by expert designers and developers and with a free domain name and free web hosting for one year, your new website will have a paved way to success.
